title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that. Then, clicking on other buttons also makes the bell sound.
OB: When I choose the SWT.MULTI option in the ControlExampleText, it beeps. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the bell sound.
